vernac_cmds: Fixpoint rangespec (lo: Z) (n: nat) (P: Z -> val -> mpred): val -> mpred := match n with | O => fun _ => emp | S n' => P lo * rangespec (Z.succ lo) n' P end.
Fixpoint fold_range' {A: Type} (f: Z -> A -> A) (zero: A) (lo: Z) (n: nat) : A := match n with | O => zero | S n' => f lo (fold_range' f zero (Z.succ lo) n') end.
Definition fold_range {A: Type} (f: Z -> A -> A) (zero: A) (lo hi: Z) : A := fold_range' f zero lo (Z.to_nat (hi-lo)).
Lemma rangespec_shift_derives: forall lo lo' len P P' p p', (forall i i', lo <= i < lo + Z_of_nat len -> i - lo = i' - lo' -> P i p |-- P' i' p') -> rangespec lo len P p |-- rangespec lo' len P' p'.
revert lo lo' H; induction len; intros.
Lemma rangespec_ext_derives: forall lo len P P' p, (forall i, lo <= i < lo + Z_of_nat len -> P i p |-- P' i p) -> rangespec lo len P p |-- rangespec lo len P' p.
Lemma rangespec_shift: forall lo lo' len P P' p p', (forall i i', lo <= i < lo + Z_of_nat len -> i - lo = i' - lo' -> P i p = P' i' p') -> rangespec lo len P p = rangespec lo' len P' p'.
intros; apply pred_ext; apply rangespec_shift_derives; intros.
Lemma rangespec_ext: forall lo len P P' p, (forall i, lo <= i < lo + Z_of_nat len -> P i p = P' i p) -> rangespec lo len P p = rangespec lo len P' p.
intros; apply pred_ext; apply rangespec_ext_derives; intros; rewrite H; auto.
Lemma rangespec_sepcon: forall lo len P Q p, rangespec lo len P p * rangespec lo len Q p = rangespec lo len (P * Q) p.
Lemma rangespec_elim: forall lo len P i, lo <= i < lo + Z_of_nat len -> rangespec lo len P |-- P i * TT.
revert lo i H; induction len; intros.
replace (P i x * !!True) with (TT * (P i x * TT)) by (apply pred_ext; cancel).
Inductive Forallz {A} (P: Z -> A->Prop) : Z -> list A -> Prop := | Forallz_nil : forall i, Forallz P i nil | Forallz_cons : forall i x l, P i x -> Forallz P (Z.succ i) l -> Forallz P i (x::l).

Definition array_pred {A: Type}{d: Inhabitant A} (lo hi: Z) (P: Z -> A -> val -> mpred) (v: list A) (p: val) : mpred := !! (Zlength v = hi - lo) && rangespec lo (Z.to_nat (hi-lo)) (fun i => P i (Znth (i-lo) v)) p.
Definition struct_pred (m: members) {A: ident * type -> Type} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) (v: compact_prod (map A m)) (p: val): mpred.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [exact emp |].
revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i0, t0) m]; intros ? ? v.
exact ((P _ (fst v) p) * IHm i0 t0 (snd v)).
Definition union_pred (m: members) {A: ident * type -> Type} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) (v: compact_sum (map A m)) (p: val): mpred.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [exact emp |].
revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i0, t0) m]; intros ? ? v.
Definition array_Prop {A: Type} (d:A) (lo hi: Z) (P: Z -> A -> Prop) (v: list A) : Prop := Zlength v = hi-lo /\ Forallz P 0 v.
Definition struct_Prop (m: members) {A: ident * type -> Type} (P: forall it, A it -> Prop) (v: compact_prod (map A m)) : Prop.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [exact True |].
revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i0, t0) m]; intros ? ? v.
exact ((P _ (fst v)) /\ IHm i0 t0 (snd v)).
Definition union_Prop (m: members) {A: ident * type -> Type} (P: forall it, A it -> Prop) (v: compact_sum (map A m)): Prop.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [exact True |].
revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i0, t0) m]; intros ? ? v.
Lemma array_pred_len_0: forall {A}{d: Inhabitant A} lo hi P p, hi = lo -> array_pred lo hi P nil p = emp.
replace (Z.to_nat (hi - lo)) with 0%nat by (symmetry; apply nat_of_Z_neg; omega).
rewrite prop_true_andp by (unfold Zlength; simpl; omega).
Lemma array_pred_len_1: forall {A}{d: Inhabitant A} i P v p, array_pred i (i + 1) P (v :: nil) p = P i v p.
rewrite prop_true_andp by (unfold Zlength; simpl; omega).

Lemma split_array_pred: forall {A}{d: Inhabitant A} lo mid hi P v p, lo <= mid <= hi -> Zlength v = hi - lo -> array_pred lo hi P v p = array_pred lo mid P (sublist 0 (mid-lo) v) p * array_pred mid hi P (sublist (mid-lo) (hi-lo) v) p.
rewrite prop_true_andp by (rewrite !Zlength_sublist by omega; omega).
replace (Z.to_nat (hi-lo)) with (n + Z.to_nat (hi-mid))%nat in * by (subst n; rewrite <- Z2Nat.inj_add by omega; f_equal; omega).
assert (lo = mid - Z.of_nat n) by (rewrite Heqn; rewrite Z2Nat.id by omega; omega).
revert lo v H H0; induction n; intros.
rewrite Z2Nat.id in H0 by omega.
repeat match goal with |- context [(?A * ?B) p] => change ((A*B)p) with (A p * B p) end.
rewrite Znth_sublist by (try rewrite Nat2Z.inj_succ; omega).

replace (rangespec (Z.succ lo) (n + Z.to_nat (hi - mid)) (fun i : Z => P i (Znth (i - lo) v)) p) with (rangespec (Z.succ lo) (n + Z.to_nat (hi - mid)) (fun i : Z => P i (Znth (i - Z.succ lo) (skipn 1 v))) p).
rewrite Z2Nat.id in H1 by omega.
replace (i - mid + (mid - Z.succ lo)) with (i - Z.succ lo) by omega.

Lemma array_pred_shift: forall {A}{d: Inhabitant A} (lo hi lo' hi' mv : Z) P' P v p, lo - lo' = mv -> hi - hi' = mv -> (forall i i', lo <= i < hi -> i - i' = mv -> P' i' (Znth (i-lo) v) p = P i (Znth (i-lo) v) p) -> array_pred lo' hi' P' v p = array_pred lo hi P v p.
replace (hi' - lo') with (hi - lo) by omega.
rewrite H4; rewrite Z2Nat.id in H3 by omega.
rewrite <- H4; rewrite Z2Nat.id in H3 by omega.

Lemma array_pred_ext_derives: forall {A B} (dA: Inhabitant A) (dB: Inhabitant B) lo hi P0 P1 (v0: list A) v1 p, (Zlength v0 = hi - lo -> Zlength v1 = hi - lo) -> (forall i, lo <= i < hi -> P0 i (Znth (i-lo) v0) p |-- P1 i (Znth (i-lo) v1) p) -> array_pred lo hi P0 v0 p |-- array_pred lo hi P1 v1 p.
rewrite Z2Nat_neg in H2 by omega.
rewrite Z2Nat.id in H2 by omega.

Lemma array_pred_ext: forall {A B} (dA: Inhabitant A) (dB: Inhabitant B) lo hi P0 P1 (v0: list A) (v1: list B) p, Zlength v0 = Zlength v1 -> (forall i, lo <= i < hi -> P0 i (Znth (i-lo) v0) p = P1 i (Znth (i-lo) v1) p) -> array_pred lo hi P0 v0 p = array_pred lo hi P1 v1 p.
intros; apply pred_ext; apply array_pred_ext_derives; intros; try omega; rewrite H0; auto.
Lemma at_offset_array_pred: forall {A} {d: Inhabitant A} lo hi P v ofs p, at_offset (array_pred lo hi P v) ofs p = array_pred lo hi (fun i v => at_offset (P i v) ofs) v p.
assert (i = i') by omega; subst i'; clear H0.
Lemma array_pred_sepcon: forall {A} {d: Inhabitant A} lo hi P Q v p, array_pred lo hi P v p * array_pred lo hi Q v p = array_pred lo hi (P * Q) v p.

Lemma struct_pred_ext_derives: forall m {A0 A1} (P0: forall it, A0 it -> val -> mpred) (P1: forall it, A1 it -> val -> mpred) v0 v1 p, members_no_replicate m = true -> (forall i d0 d1, in_members i m -> P0 _ (proj_struct i m v0 d0) p |-- P1 _ (proj_struct i m v1 d1) p) -> struct_pred m P0 v0 p |-- struct_pred m P1 v1 p.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [simpl; auto |].
revert i0 t0 v0 v1 H H0; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
unfold eq_rect_r in H0; rewrite <- !eq_rect_eq in H0.
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P0 v0 p) with (P0 (i0, t0) (fst v0) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P0 (snd v0) p).
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P1 v1 p) with (P1 (i0, t0) (fst v1) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P1 (snd v1) p).
unfold eq_rect_r in H0; rewrite <- !eq_rect_eq in H0.
change (if ident_eq i i1 then Errors.OK t1 else Ctypes.field_type i m) with (Ctypes.field_type i ((i1, t1) :: m)) in H0.
destruct (member_dec (i, match Ctypes.field_type i ((i1, t1) :: m) with | Errors.OK t => t | Errors.Error _ => Tvoid end) (i0, t0)); [congruence |].

Lemma struct_pred_ext: forall m {A0 A1} (P0: forall it, A0 it -> val -> mpred) (P1: forall it, A1 it -> val -> mpred) v0 v1 p, members_no_replicate m = true -> (forall i d0 d1, in_members i m -> P0 _ (proj_struct i m v0 d0) p = P1 _ (proj_struct i m v1 d1) p) -> struct_pred m P0 v0 p = struct_pred m P1 v1 p.
apply pred_ext; eapply struct_pred_ext_derives; eauto; intros; erewrite H0 by eauto; auto; apply derives_refl.

Lemma struct_pred_not_member: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) (i: ident) v p, let P' it := if ident_eq i (fst it) then fun _ _ => emp else P it in ~ in_members i m -> struct_pred m P v p = struct_pred m P' v p.
revert i0 t0 H v; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros i0 t0 H.
intro; apply H; subst; left; auto.
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P v p) with (P _ (fst v) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P (snd v) p).
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P' v p) with (P' _ (fst v) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P' (snd v) p).

Lemma struct_pred_proj: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) (i: ident) v p d, let P' it := if ident_eq i (fst it) then fun _ _ => emp else P it in members_no_replicate m = true -> in_members i m -> struct_pred m P v p = P _ (proj_struct i m v d) p * struct_pred m P' v p.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [inv H0 |].
revert i0 t0 H v d H0; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
destruct H0; [simpl in H0; subst i | tauto].
apply members_no_replicate_ind in H1; destruct H1.
simpl compact_prod in v |- *; simpl Ctypes.field_type in d |- *.
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P v p) with (P _ (fst v) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P (snd v) p).
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P' v p) with (P' _ (fst v) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P' (snd v) p).
match goal with | |- context [member_dec (i, ?t') (i0, t0)] => destruct (member_dec (i, t') (i0, t0)); [inversion e; congruence |] end.

Lemma struct_pred_upd: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) (i: ident) v p v0, let P' it := if ident_eq i (fst it) then fun _ _ => emp else P it in members_no_replicate m = true -> in_members i m -> struct_pred m P (upd_struct i m v v0) p = P _ v0 p * struct_pred m P' v p.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [inv H0 |].
revert i0 t0 H v v0 H0; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
destruct H0; [simpl in H0; subst i | tauto].
apply members_no_replicate_ind in H1; destruct H1.
simpl compact_prod in v |- *; simpl Ctypes.field_type in v0 |- *.
set (v' := (upd_struct i ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) v v0)).
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P v' p) with (P _ (fst v') p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P (snd v') p).
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P' v p) with (P' _ (fst v) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P' (snd v) p).
match goal with | |- context [member_dec (i, ?t') (i0, t0)] => destruct (member_dec (i, t') (i0, t0)); [inversion e; congruence |] end.
simpl in IHm |- *; erewrite IHm by auto.

Lemma struct_pred_ramif: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) (i: ident) v p d, in_members i m -> members_no_replicate m = true -> struct_pred m P v p |-- P _ (proj_struct i m v d) p * (ALL v0: _, P _ v0 p -* struct_pred m P (upd_struct i m v v0) p).
set (P' it := if ident_eq i (fst it) then fun _ _ => emp else P it).
apply RAMIF_Q.solve with (struct_pred m P' v p).
Lemma at_offset_struct_pred: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) v p ofs, at_offset (struct_pred m P v) ofs p = struct_pred m (fun it v => at_offset (P it v) ofs) v p.
revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.

Lemma corable_andp_struct_pred: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) v p Q, corable Q -> Q && struct_pred m P v p = match m with | nil => Q && emp | _ => struct_pred m (fun it v p => Q && P it v p) v p end.
revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P v p) with (P (i0, t0) (fst v) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P (snd v) p).
Lemma struct_pred_sepcon: forall m {A} (P Q: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) v p, struct_pred m P v p * struct_pred m Q v p = struct_pred m (fun it => P it * Q it) v p.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [| revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros].
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P v p) with (P (i0, t0) (fst v) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) P (snd v) p).
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) Q v p) with (Q (i0, t0) (fst v) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) Q (snd v) p).
change (struct_pred ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) (fun it => P it * Q it) v p) with (P (i0, t0) (fst v) p * Q (i0, t0) (fst v) p * struct_pred ((i1, t1) :: m) (fun it => P it * Q it) (snd v) p).

Lemma compact_sum_inj_eq_spec: forall {A} a0 a1 (l: list A) F0 F1 (v0: compact_sum (map F0 (a0 :: a1 :: l))) (v1: compact_sum (map F1 (a0 :: a1 :: l))) H, ~ In a0 (a1 :: l) -> ((forall a, compact_sum_inj v0 a H <-> compact_sum_inj v1 a H) <-> match v0, v1 with | inl _, inl _ => True | inr v0, inr v1 => forall a, compact_sum_inj (v0: compact_sum (map F0 (a1 :: l))) a H <-> compact_sum_inj (v1: compact_sum (map F1 (a1 :: l))) a H | _, _ => False end).

assert (~ (forall a : A, iff (@compact_sum_inj A F0 (@cons A a0 (@cons A a1 l)) (@inl (F0 a0) (compact_sum (@map A Type F0 (@cons A a1 l))) f) a H) (@compact_sum_inj A F1 (@cons A a0 (@cons A a1 l)) (@inr (F1 a0) (compact_sum (@map A Type F1 (@cons A a1 l))) c) a H))); [| tauto].

assert (~ (forall a : A, iff (@compact_sum_inj A F0 (@cons A a0 (@cons A a1 l)) (@inr (F0 a0) (compact_sum (@map A Type F0 (@cons A a1 l))) c) a H) (@compact_sum_inj A F1 (@cons A a0 (@cons A a1 l)) (@inl (F1 a0) (compact_sum (@map A Type F1 (@cons A a1 l))) f) a H))); [| tauto].
split; intros HH a; specialize (HH a).
pose proof compact_sum_inj_in c a H.
pose proof compact_sum_inj_in c0 a H.

Lemma union_pred_ext_derives: forall m {A0 A1} (P0: forall it, A0 it -> val -> mpred) (P1: forall it, A1 it -> val -> mpred) v0 v1 p, members_no_replicate m = true -> (forall it, members_union_inj v0 it <-> members_union_inj v1 it) -> (forall i d0 d1, members_union_inj v0 (i, field_type i m) -> members_union_inj v1 (i, field_type i m) -> P0 _ (proj_union i m v0 d0) p |-- P1 _ (proj_union i m v1 d1) p) -> union_pred m P0 v0 p |-- union_pred m P1 v1 p.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [simpl; auto |].
revert i0 t0 v0 v1 H H0 H1; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
unfold eq_rect_r in H1; rewrite <- !eq_rect_eq in H1.
intro HH; apply in_map with (f := fst) in HH.
destruct v0 as [v0 | v0], v1 as [v1 | v1]; try solve [inversion H0].
unfold eq_rect_r in H1; rewrite <- !eq_rect_eq in H1.
pose proof compact_sum_inj_in v0 (i, field_type i ((i1, t1) :: m)) member_dec.
apply in_map with (f := fst) in H0.
change (if ident_eq i i1 then Errors.OK t1 else Ctypes.field_type i m) with (Ctypes.field_type i ((i1, t1) :: m)) in H1.
destruct (member_dec (i, match Ctypes.field_type i ((i1, t1) :: m) with | Errors.OK t => t | Errors.Error _ => Tvoid end) (i0, t0)); [congruence |].

Lemma union_pred_ext: forall m {A0 A1} (P0: forall it, A0 it -> val -> mpred) (P1: forall it, A1 it -> val -> mpred) v0 v1 p, members_no_replicate m = true -> (forall it, members_union_inj v0 it <-> members_union_inj v1 it) -> (forall i d0 d1, members_union_inj v0 (i, field_type i m) -> members_union_inj v1 (i, field_type i m) -> P0 _ (proj_union i m v0 d0) p = P1 _ (proj_union i m v1 d1) p) -> union_pred m P0 v0 p = union_pred m P1 v1 p.
assert (forall it, members_union_inj v1 it <-> members_union_inj v0 it) by (intro it; specialize (H0 it); tauto).
apply pred_ext; eapply union_pred_ext_derives; auto; intros; erewrite H1 by eauto; apply derives_refl.

Lemma union_pred_derives_const: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) p v R, members_no_replicate m = true -> m <> nil -> (forall i (v: A (i, field_type i m)), in_members i m -> P _ v p |-- R) -> union_pred m P v p |-- R.
revert i0 t0 v H H1; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
rewrite members_no_replicate_ind in H; destruct H.
simpl in H1; destruct (ident_eq i i0); [congruence |].

Lemma union_pred_proj: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) (i: ident) v p d, members_no_replicate m = true -> in_members i m -> (forall i' (v': A (i', field_type i' m)), in_members i' m -> P _ v' p |-- P _ d p) -> union_pred m P v p |-- P _ (proj_union i m v d) p.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [inv H0 |].
revert i0 t0 v d H H0 H1; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
destruct H0; [simpl in H0; subst i | tauto].
rewrite members_no_replicate_ind in H; destruct H.
simpl in *; destruct (ident_eq i i0), v.
apply (union_pred_derives_const ((i1, t1) :: m) P p y); [auto | congruence |].
simpl in H1; destruct (ident_eq i i0); [congruence |].
match goal with | |- context [member_dec (i, ?t') (i0, t0)] => destruct (member_dec (i, t') (i0, t0)); [inversion e; congruence |] end.
match goal with | |- context [member_dec (i, ?t') (i0, t0)] => destruct (member_dec (i, t') (i0, t0)); [inversion e; congruence |] end.
simpl in H1; destruct (ident_eq i' i0); [congruence |].
Lemma union_pred_upd: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) (i: ident) v p v0, members_no_replicate m = true -> in_members i m -> union_pred m P (upd_union i m v v0) p = P _ v0 p.
destruct (in_dec member_dec (i, field_type i m) m) as [?H | ?H]; [| apply in_members_field_type in H0; tauto].
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [inv H0 |].
revert i0 t0 v0 H H0 H1; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
destruct H0; [simpl in H0; subst i | tauto].
destruct H0; [simpl in H0; subst i |].
match goal with | |- context [member_dec (i, ?t') (i0, t0)] => destruct (member_dec (i, t') (i0, t0)); [inversion e; congruence |] end.
rewrite members_no_replicate_ind in H; destruct H.

Lemma union_pred_ramif: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) (i: ident) v p d, (forall i' (v': A (i', field_type i' m)), in_members i' m -> P _ v' p |-- P _ d p) -> in_members i m -> members_no_replicate m = true -> union_pred m P v p |-- P _ (proj_union i m v d) p * (ALL v0: _, P _ v0 p -* union_pred m P (upd_union i m v v0) p).
Lemma at_offset_union_pred: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) v p ofs, at_offset (union_pred m P v) ofs p = union_pred m (fun it v => at_offset (P it v) ofs) v p.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [simpl; auto |].
revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
Lemma andp_union_pred: forall m {A} (P: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) v p Q, Q && union_pred m P v p = match m with | nil => Q && emp | _ => union_pred m (fun it v p => Q && P it v p) v p end.
revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
Lemma union_pred_sepcon: forall m {A} (P Q: forall it, A it -> val -> mpred) v p, union_pred m P v p * union_pred m Q v p = union_pred m (fun it => P it * Q it) v p.
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [| revert i0 t0 v; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros].

Lemma struct_Prop_compact_prod_gen: forall m (F: ident * type -> Type) (P: forall it, F it -> Prop) (f: forall it, F it), members_no_replicate m = true -> (forall i, in_members i m -> P (i, field_type i m) (f (i, field_type i m))) -> struct_Prop m P (compact_prod_gen f m).
destruct m as [| (i0, t0) m]; [simpl; auto |].
revert i0 t0 H H0; induction m as [| (i1, t1) m]; intros.
rewrite if_true in H0 by auto.

change (struct_Prop ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m) P (compact_prod_gen f ((i0, t0) :: (i1, t1) :: m))) with (P (i0, t0) (f (i0, t0)) /\ struct_Prop ((i1, t1) :: m) P (compact_prod_gen f ((i1, t1) :: m))).
rewrite if_true in H0 by auto.
rewrite members_no_replicate_ind in H; destruct H.

assert (align 0 (alignof t0) = 0) by apply align_0, alignof_pos.
revert H0; pattern ofs at 1 4; replace ofs with (ofs + align 0 (alignof t0)) by omega; intros.
revert H; pattern sz at 2 4; replace sz with (sz - align 0 (alignof t0)) by omega; intros.

rewrite <- memory_block_split by (simpl in H; revert H; pose_align_le; pose_sizeof_pos; intros; omega).
rewrite members_no_replicate_ind in NO_REPLI; destruct NO_REPLI as [NOT_IN NO_REPLI].
rewrite (neq_field_offset_rec_cons cenv_cs i i0 t0) by auto.
rewrite (neq_field_offset_next_rec_cons cenv_cs i i0 t0) by auto.

Definition struct_data_at_rec_aux_spec: forall {cs: compspecs} (sh: share) m m0 sz v P, struct_data_at_rec_aux sh m m0 sz (ListTypeGen (fun it => reptype (field_type (fst it) m0) -> val -> mpred) P m) v = struct_pred m (fun it v => withspacer sh (field_offset cenv_cs (fst it) m0 + sizeof (field_type (fst it) m0)) (field_offset_next cenv_cs (fst it) m0 sz) (at_offset (P it v) (field_offset cenv_cs (fst it) m0))) v := @struct_data_at_rec_aux_spec.

Definition union_data_at_rec_aux_spec: forall {cs: compspecs} sh m m0 sz v P, union_data_at_rec_aux sh m m0 sz (ListTypeGen (fun it => reptype (field_type (fst it) m0) -> val -> mpred) P m) v = union_pred m (fun it v => withspacer sh (sizeof (field_type (fst it) m0)) sz (P it v)) v := @union_data_at_rec_aux_spec.

Definition struct_value_fits_aux: forall {cs: compspecs} (m m0: members) (P: ListType (map (fun it => reptype (field_type (fst it) m0) -> Prop) m)) (v: compact_prod (map (fun it => reptype (field_type (fst it) m0)) m)), Prop := @struct_value_fits_aux.

Definition union_value_fits_aux: forall {cs: compspecs} (m m0: members) (P: ListType (map (fun it => reptype (field_type (fst it) m0) -> Prop) m)) (v: compact_sum (map (fun it => reptype (field_type (fst it) m0)) m)), Prop := @union_value_fits_aux.

Definition struct_value_fits_aux_spec: forall {cs: compspecs} m m0 v P, struct_value_fits_aux m m0 (ListTypeGen (fun it => reptype (field_type (fst it) m0) -> Prop) P m) v = struct_Prop m P v := @struct_value_fits_aux_spec.

Definition union_value_fits_aux_spec: forall {cs: compspecs} m m0 v P, union_value_fits_aux m m0 (ListTypeGen (fun it => reptype (field_type (fst it) m0) -> Prop) P m) v = union_Prop m P v := @union_value_fits_aux_spec.

Definition memory_block_array_pred: forall {cs: compspecs} {A : Type} {d : Inhabitant A} (a: A) sh t z b ofs, 0 <= z -> 0 <= ofs /\ ofs + sizeof t * z < Ptrofs.modulus -> array_pred 0 z (fun i _ p => memory_block sh (sizeof t) (offset_val (sizeof t * i) p)) (list_repeat (Z.to_nat z) a) (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr ofs)) = memory_block sh (sizeof t * z) (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr ofs)) := @memory_block_array_pred'.

Definition memory_block_struct_pred: forall {cs: compspecs} sh m sz {A} (v: compact_prod (map A m)) b ofs, (m = nil -> sz = 0) -> members_no_replicate m = true -> sizeof_struct cenv_cs 0 m <= sz < Ptrofs.modulus -> 0 <= ofs /\ ofs + sz < Ptrofs.modulus -> struct_pred m (fun it _ p => (memory_block sh (field_offset_next cenv_cs (fst it) m sz - field_offset cenv_cs (fst it) m)) (offset_val (field_offset cenv_cs (fst it) m) p)) v (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr ofs)) = memory_block sh sz (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr ofs)) := @memory_block_struct_pred.

Definition memory_block_union_pred: forall sh m sz {A} (v: compact_sum (map A m)) b ofs, (m = nil -> sz = 0) -> union_pred m (fun it _ => memory_block sh sz) v (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr ofs)) = memory_block sh sz (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr ofs)) := @memory_block_union_pred.
